Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and K.L. Rahul's 165-run partnership for the fourth wicket rescued India from a precarious three wickets for two runs.
India won by six wickets, posting 201 for four in 41.2 overs.
Ishan Kishan's early dismissal after attempting an extravagant drive against Mitchell Starc.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli, known for his skill in uphill pursuits, found a fine ally in 'Player-of-the-Match' K.L. Rahul.
The match was described as oscillating between agony and ecstasy, culminating in a winning note for India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the M.A. Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai.
Australia was restricted to 199 by Jadeja & Co.
